en.title: Official Appoinment
en.content:
FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of Champion Body Builder, Malek Noor, as our company's spokesman for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Malek Noor's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. It is a great way to start New Year 2007! Welcome, Malek!
 
Click Here to Read Malek Noor's Testimonial

meta.description: FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of Champion Body Builder, Malek Noor, as our company's spokesman for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Malek Noor's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. It is a great way to start New Year 2007! Welcome, Malek
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: Perlantikan Rasmi.
bm.content: FusionExcel dengan sukacitanya mengumumkan perlantikan Juara Senam dan Binaraga, Malek Noor, sebagai jurucakap untuk Loket Kuantum kami yang mengagumkan. Pengalaman individu dan sokongan Malek Noor kepada Loket Kuantum FusionExcel tentu akan membawa FusionExcel ke tahap perkembangan yang lebih tinggi lagi. Ini merupakan sesuatu permulaan yang terbaik untuk tahun 2007. Selamat datang Malek!.
